Body.Content:
We are announcing the Use Copilot to analyze work queue data feature for Power Automate. This feature enables Copilot to answer questions about work queue statuses and handling times. This feature will reach general availability on January 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature allows Copilot within automation center to ask questions about cloud flow and desktop flow activity, work queues, and Power Automate features.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Automation center (preview).

Title: Power Automate â€“ Use Copilot to analyze work queue data
